[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@spruceid/ssx-serverless](./ssx-serverless.md) &gt; [SSXServer](./ssx-serverless.ssxserver.md)

## SSXServer class

SSX-Server is a server-side library made to work with the SSX client libraries. SSX-Server is the base class that takes in a configuration object to add authentication and metrics to your server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SSXServer 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(config, session)](./ssx-serverless.ssxserver._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>SSXServer</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [generateNonce](./ssx-serverless.ssxserver.generatenonce.md) |  | () =&gt; string | Generates a nonce for use in the SSX client libraries. Nonce is a random string that is used to prevent replay attacks. Wraps the generateNonce function from the SIWE library. |
|  [getNonce](./ssx-serverless.ssxserver.getnonce.md) |  | (getNonceOpts?: { sessionKey?: any; generateUpdateValue?: (nonce: string) =&gt; any; generateCreateValue?: (nonce: string) =&gt; any; createOpts?: Record&lt;string, any&gt;; updateOpts?: Record&lt;string, any&gt;; }) =&gt; Promise&lt;{ nonce: string; dbResult: any; }&gt; | Generates a nonce and stores it in the current session if a sessionKey is provided or creates a new one if not. |
